com.viaoa.jfc.text

Class OATextController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.viaoa.jfc.text.OATextController
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    OAHTMLTextPaneController

    public class OATextController
extends Object
    Adds popup menu and spellcheck to any text component
    See Also:
    for an example.
